snippet.title: Ereban: Shadow Legacy - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
*Buy now on Steam:* https://store.steampowered.com/app/1671360/Ereban_Shadow_Legacy/

Merge with the Shadows to find the Truth in Ereban: Shadow Legacy this April 10 on PC.

Ereban: Shadow Legacy puts you in control of female protagonist Ayana,the last descendant of the Ereban race, possessing the unique ability to merge and roam freely within the shadows. As you uncover the enigmatic connection between the cryptic energy megacorporation Helios and her people, you will master the combination of Ayana's agility with her mystical shadow powers and high-tech gadgets to either cleverly avoid or mercilessly defeat anything and anyone that stands in her way in pursuit of the truth.

For the latest updates, follow:
*Twitter:* https://twitter.com/BabyRobotGames
*Instagram:* https://instagram.com/babyrobotgames/
*Discord:* https://discord.gg/t4qqSC8FCy 
*Reddit:* https://www.reddit.com/r/ErebanGame/
